articles.content: International break means it's time for a rare breather during this Premier League season like no other. Even eight rounds in, there's an element of chaos and unpredictability about unfolding events.… [+25752 chars]

articles.author: Connor O'Neill
articles.title: Gini Wijnaldum provides spiky response over new Liverpool contract - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Wijnaldum's contract with Liverpool expires at the end of this season, and the 30-year-old is yet to commit to a new deal.
articles.content:
Georginio Wijnaldum refused to give anything away when asked if he was going to sign a new contract with Liverpool.
